channel.title: Washington Redskins Hogcasts from www.thehogs.net
channel.description: Podcasting about the Washington Redskins and Washington Redskin fans.
channel.itunes:author: bosshog@thehogs.net
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcasting about the Washington Redskins
channel.itunes:summary: We podcast about the Washington Redskins. Each week, sometimes more often, we talk about everything going on in the Redskins Nation. We're here to help you bleed burgundy and gold no matter where you are. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store.

item.title: THN On Ice - Episode 2
item.description: Scott Hurrey and Mark Solway discuss this week in Caps Nation: reviewing the Maple Leafs win and Rangers loss, and previewing the game against the Flyers. Guests - Capitals owner Ted Leonsis, Eric McErlain, and John Sparenberg.
item.itunes:author: TheHogs.net
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott Hurrey and Mark Solway discuss this week in Caps Nation: reviewing the Maple Leafs win and Rangers loss, and previewing the game against the Flyers. Guests - Capitals owner Ted Leonsis, Eric McErlain, and John Sparenberg.
item.itunes:summary: Scott Hurrey and Mark Solway discuss this week in Caps Nation: reviewing the Maple Leafs win and Rangers loss, and previewing the game against the Flyers. Guests - Capitals owner Ted Leonsis, Eric McErlain, and John Sparenberg.
item.itunes:keywords: washington capitals, ted leonsis, toronto maple leafs, philadelphia flyers, new york rangers, hershey bears, eric mcerlain, john sparenberg

item.title: THN On Ice - Episode 1
item.description: Check out the inaugural THN On Ice podcast about the Washington Capitals. Scott Hurrey and Mark Solway review the Caps win over the Lightning, preview the Canucks game, and more. Special guests - Mike Vogl and John Sparenberg.
item.itunes:author: TheHogs.net
item.itunes:subtitle: Check out the inaugural THN On Ice podcast about the Washington Capitals. Scott Hurrey and Mark Solway review the Caps win over the Lightning, preview the Canucks game, and more. Special guests - Mike Vogl and John Sparenberg.

item.itunes:keywords: washington capitals, tampa bay lightning, vancouver canucks, hershey bears, mike vogl, john sparenberg
